meanings.definition: A person who uses crayons to create art.
meanings.sent1: The young crayoners happily colored their drawings.
meanings.sent2: The crayoners at the art class were very talented.
meanings.sent3: The crayoners had a colorful competition to see who could draw the silliest face.
meanings.sent4: The walls of the classroom were covered in the creations of the little crayoners.
meanings.sent5: The crayoners' artwork brightened up the room with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The act of creating art with crayons.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the crayoners' workshop at the library.
meanings.sent2: The crayoners' drawings were displayed at the school art show.
meanings.sent3: The crayoners' masterpiece was a giant rainbow on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent4: The crayoners' art transformed the plain walls into a gallery of colors.
meanings.sent5: The crayoners' creativity shone through their colorful drawings.
